idea:
I am an animal lover and I, with some of my fellow animal lovers, started an initiative called StraysCue in June 2021 by creating a mobile application to act as a bridge between distressed stray animals and required help- in terms of treatment, nurturing, and rehabilitation. Specifically, we aim to create one central platform to handle reporting and volunteering of animal rescue cases along with donations so that any person can track the progress of any case in any given location with regular updates. Moreover, we facilitate trust since donors can understand which caretakers they are donating to, their statistics, records of cases they have successfully handled so far, paired with case documentation and recovery journeys with bills uploaded whenever possible on the app. Finally, with our Resources (Vets, NGOs, shops, etc. in a location), and Expert-approved Education (How to approach an animal, What to feed an animal, etc.) sections, we aim to be a one-stop solution for anyone with any queries related to approaching or handling most animal-related queries. We recently completed our BETA testing of the application in a small region in Mumbai last and are ready for a full launch. However, we lack the funds required to get the application running due to storage and server costs.

We also lack experience in this space and it would be great if you could connect with us or help us in any way with all your experience working in the start-up, and pets and animals space. We are seeking someone who can mentor us and take us in the right direction.
name: StraysCue
